definition: a course of reasoning aimed at demonstrating a truth or falsehood
details:
noun
- a course of reasoning aimed at demonstrating a truth or falsehood
= synonyms: line
- a variable in a logical or mathematical expression whose value determines the dependent variable
- (computer science) a reference or value that is passed to a function, procedure, subroutine, command, or program
= synonyms: parameter
- a summary of the subject or plot of a literary work or play or movie
= example: a summary of the subject or plot of a literary work or play or movie
= synonyms: literary argument
- a fact or assertion offered as evidence that something is true
= example: a fact or assertion offered as evidence that something is true
= synonyms: statement
- a discussion in which reasons are advanced for and against some proposition or proposal
= example: a discussion in which reasons are advanced for and against some proposition or proposal
= synonyms: argumentation
- a contentious speech act
= synonyms: tilt
